Sparky:
Hey, listen to me. Look around! There is so little space! All day I stand here listening to the murmur of water somewhere... And I can't even leave this place! I'm about to lose my mind!
I want to run outside, but because of visitors like you I can't leave this place. But don't get me wrong, I'm happy that you're here. No visitors means no news and that would make my life even more miserable.
Never forget that being free to go wherever you like is a blessing.
I have recipes for items, but they are only availabe for characters that are of Lv. 85+ and have completed the 4th class change. It's very important!
